cn.sellerName: Xiamen Daoqimao Network Technology Co., Ltd.
cn.description:
《无处遁形：全网公敌》是Steam平台广受好评的剧情向黑客解密游戏《全网公敌》手游版本。玩家通过网络搜索和社工手段获取目标人物信息，其隐藏最深的秘密都无处遁形。游戏中的每个故事看似各自独立，但随着剧情的发展却是草蛇灰线，伏脉千里。当所有事件串联起来，竟隐藏着惊天的秘密……

希望玩家在游玩的同时，对网络本身也能产生反思，学会保护好个人隐私。

【游戏内容】
◆第一章：程序员之死
某公司CEO跳楼自杀，自称被毒妻勒索千万；而妻子却在社交网络上发布被家暴的照片。谣言满天，谁在说谎？
◆第二章：看不见的眼睛
女大学生的不雅视频在网络疯传，这一刻，她已然社会性死亡。到底谁才是始作俑者？女性的安全又该由谁去保护？
◆第三章：消失的证据
品学兼优的学生会长忽然失踪。霸凌事件使案情越发扑朔迷离。谁是凶手，谁是受害者？
◆第四章：羞辱的代价
天降巨瓜，女歌星再次被爆黑料！恐吓信、炒作、前女团成员自杀事件……网络再掀舆论狂欢！
◆第五章：永生代码
当社会陷入癫狂，你是否也愿意加入永生代码，获得真正的爱与永生？
◆DLC：甜蜜之家
一个看似甜蜜而美满的家庭背后，每个人都有各自的秘密，隐藏在背后的真相到底是什么？！
◆DLC：HelloWorld
一场离奇的车祸，让泰坦公司的高级研究员Lucrezia Borgia博士当场死亡，同行的Benjamin Engle死里逃生，但他却没有意识到自己即将卷入一场巨大的阴谋之中……

【游戏特点】
◆代入感强：在虚构的世界里，玩家扮演一名黑客，接受一家公司委托，完成一个个不同的社工事件，体验真实的黑客操作。
◆玩法多样：游戏内有多个系统，除了社工系统，还会有推理、追踪、解谜，破坏侵入等系统需要玩家们去一一攻破。
◆剧情复杂：游戏中你将面临大量的选择和谜题，而不同的选择可能将导致不同的结局。
◆人物众多：登场人物众多，每个人物都有自己的性格特点，而他们背后都有着不为人知的故事，需要作为黑客的你去一一发现事件的真相。
◆全程配音：游戏中所有出现的角色都有真人配音，让整个游戏的体验和代入感更加强烈。
◆原创音乐：多首原创主题曲以及各种音乐音效，搭配精彩剧情，享受震撼体验。

【核心功能】
◆网络搜索：玩家通过浏览器搜索功能收集目标对象的基础信息。
◆数据库：利用已知信息输入到数据库中，通过筛选后或许目标对象的其他信息。
◆破解：通过获得的目标人物信息来生成密码，用于登陆各平台的账户（包括邮箱、社交平台、聊天软件等）。
◆伪装：获取目标对象的需求、社交圈等，根据信息选择伪装，通过和目标对象接触获取更多信息。
◆聊天沟通：添加目标对象为好友后，进行聊天沟通获取信息。
◆图片分析：从图片中获取有价值的信息内容及相关线索。
当然，后期还会解锁更多的高阶社工方法！

cn.description:
AppStore经典热门游戏《地下城堡: 炼金术师的魔幻之旅》官方续作。

《地下城堡2: 黑暗觉醒》是一款模拟经营与地牢探险游戏。

这一次，您的冒险队将深入绝地，在古老而诡秘的大陆展开前所未有的奇幻冒险。


▶ 成绩
- 中国游戏十强盛典 - 2017年度十大最受欢迎原创移动单机游戏
- 硬核联盟黑石奖 - 2017年度最受欢迎策略游戏
- 2016-12，AppStore iPad『为今年的独立制作喝彩』十佳
- 2016-10，AppStore『中文独立游戏精品』
- 2016-09，AppStore『一元精选专区』
- 2016-08，AppStore『本周新游』推荐
- 2016-08，AppStore经典文字冒险游戏续作Banner推荐
- 2016-08-18上线，次日荣登iPhone/iPad付费榜TOP 1


▶ 世界 & 故事
- 成为末世孤堡「庇护所」的统治者，率领民众和勇者，对抗满目疮痍的死亡国度。
- 旅途中，遇见性格迥异的角色，坦诚相待，亦或拔剑相向？您来决定谁是敌人，谁是朋友。
- 人物的微小命运相互交织，汇成蛮荒世界的时代洪流。故事的结局，由您的每个选择决定。


▶ 职业 & 冒险
- 6大职业体系，50+职业种类，人物特性与职业，育成个人风格化的战士。  
- 简易灵活的队伍编成，混编师，菜刀队，法师帮，您的想象力是唯一的极限。
- 充满乐趣的战术设置，为您的冒险队预设万全之策，决胜千里。
- 邪恶生物，诡谲陷阱，神秘路人，在冒险旅途中，意外情况时常接踵而至。
- 找到隐藏在世界中的强大敌人，挑战他们！


▶ 对战 & 手速
- 与其他在线玩家进行实时对战，纸上谈兵终觉浅，竞技场内见真章。
- 即时战斗，手动操作。
- 冲击排行榜，不为成为王者，只为成为更好的自己。
- 进入失落王城（地图3）即可解锁竞技场，加油！


▶ 经典放置收益
- 继承前作经典设定，每次打开游戏，都可在城堡中收获定量资源。
- 有限的人口和工匠岗位，聪明的城主一定会运用好工匠，控制物资产出，实现城堡富足。


▶ 部分玩家评论
 - 一个有情怀的游戏 - 7舅姥爷
 - 延续前作的优秀风格 - icyweii
 - 值得玩100小时的游戏 - 大家冷静啊
 - 值得推荐，玩过一代的完全可以再入手 - 伪小小
 - 游戏非常棒，比一代有很多进步的地方 - 五星五星五
 - 值得下载，地1暗月神已通关，是时候来波2了 - 朱丽叶安眠曲
 - 没有所谓的新手礼包，没有一直提醒的商城更新，没有多余的复杂操作。感觉回归到了所谓游戏最纯粹的体验里，是个能一直慢慢玩下去的游戏。- 呆韵

cn.releaseNotes:
【v.3.5.8 更新公告】
*推荐各位细胞人使用云存档功能备份存档~避免卸载原安装包后出现存档丢失的情况。
**各位细胞人大佬注意！随着游戏的更新以及资源量的提高，设备的最低运行配置要求会有所提升，推荐使用有可用RAM 4GB 以上的设备来运行本次的新内容哦。

以下为本次更新内容：
-将SDK进行升级
-添加了OAID相关证书
-修复了“后退”按钮触发机制
-主菜单健康公告字样进行扩大

最低设备要求： iOS 12 或更高版本，内存：4GB，RAM：4GB
注意：部分系统在游戏过程中可能出现运行内存报错弹框问题，烦请大佬们备份云存档，尝试重启游戏，再次进入游戏即可正常游玩~
同时在切换设备，或者重装游戏的时候，本地的存档会随着卸载丢失，推荐大家使用云存档功能来进行游戏进度的备份~请注意，云存档的目的是解决换机和数据备份的需求，上传及下载操作不可逆，且均需要手动操作。
cn.description:
死亡并非永眠。

操作炼金实验失败的产物，在杀戮与重生的反复轮回中探索一座房间不断变化的巨大城堡，解开这座阴暗孤岛上的秘密…!
当然，前提是你能战胜镇守其中的诸多守卫。

重生细胞是一款RogueVania类型的平台动作游戏。你需要在一次一次战斗中锤炼战斗技巧，精通拥有独特使用方式的各种武器，并且将翻滚和闪避等走位操作视为本能，以逃过那些出其不意出现的怪潮侵袭，迎战强横凶残的守卫和Boss。

鏖战、死亡、重生、再战

继PC与主机平台之后，《重生细胞》准备在移动平台开启战斗！

【主要特色】
• RogueVania: 逐步攻略经过悉心设计的相连关卡，体验rogue-lite类型的重复可玩性，直面肾上腺素激增的凶险场面。
• 凌厉爽快的2D动作体验：洞悉敌人的出手套路灵活走位，否则你将止步于半途，无缘城堡中隐藏的更多秘密。
• 非线性进程：在反复的死亡中突破难关，根据自己的游玩风格或心情自由选择装备与技能搭配。厌倦了臭气熏天的下水道？攀上城头呼吸新鲜的空气吧！
• 随心所欲的游玩：探索城堡的边边角角和隐秘通道，发现深藏在城堡深处的迷人景观，抑或是直冲终点？一切由你。

【针对移动平台进行的悉心优化】
• 两种攻击模式：传统与移动版新加入的自动攻击系统。
• 定制键位与触屏操作：根据你的喜好调整按钮位置及大小，通过触屏滑动来进行闪避走位…
• MFi设备以及主机控制器蓝牙连接特性支持。

cn.releaseNotes: 春天里的便利店，营业中！
cn.description:
《便利店开业日记》是一款模拟经营类游戏，你将化身店长，从经营一家丰富多彩的便利店开始。在游戏过程中，你需要设置货架、培养店员、服务顾客......快来打造最客流最高、最受欢迎的连锁便利店！

【精心陈列，打造特色专柜!】
研究商品搭配，精心打造人气货架。不断开发新商品，打造更多特色专柜吧！

【精确经营，把握商品库存！】
时刻关注货架情况，设置合理的补货数量，减少废弃率，实现利润最大化！

【培养店员，赢得比赛优胜！】
通过完成挑战提升店员各项能力，为客户提供更好的服务，同时冲击评选赛优胜！

【满足顾客，获取丰厚回报！】
分发试用商品，俘获顾客们的青睐。满足顾客心愿，培养店铺的忠实顾客！

【开设分店，打造连锁品牌!】
不断扩张规模，在新地区开设分店。击败本地对手，打造你的连锁便利店品牌！

便利店里有 200 种以上不同的产品！ 我惊讶地发现，这里的商品比我想象的还要多： 饭团、炸饭团、甜点布丁......还有零食薯片......我去便利店的时候，总会忍不住买一堆计划外的东西。所以，如果你能打造出精美的商品货架，顾客肯定也会大量购买的。此外， 您还可以享受与竞争对手商店的销售战！

——开罗君亲笔信

cn.releaseNotes: 悠闲露营，城市逃离计划开启！
cn.description:
《森丘露营地》是一款模拟经营类游戏，你将化身露营地经营者，从露营地的精心布局到露营好物商店的建设。在游戏过程中，你需要围绕露营场地布置活动区域与自然景致、并不断创新吸引更多的露营爱好者，快来打造最美、最有趣的露营地！

【布局仙人，打造氛围感露营地！】
精心考虑布局，充分利用山丘的高低落差与随季节变换的植被，打造不照骗的打卡地！

【捕虫&观鸟&钓鱼！顾客愿望一次满足！】
在露营地周围设置丰富的活动区域，溪流乐钓、篝火烤肉，都不白来！

【上架露营神器，引领露营潮流！】
打造露营一站式服务！开发更多露营好物，引领露营界新潮流！

【放置观看，感受小确幸】
无需操作，放置观赏四季与昼夜变换带来的不同景色。感受超萌像素小人带来的治愈风景~

我本身是个喜欢室内活动的人，但因为想体验一下户外的乐趣，所以制作了这款露营游戏。在自然环境中的开发画面感觉很棒，于是灵感一来，就创作出了许多露营用品。既然都做了，就设计成可以经营露营小商店。开发过程中吃了很多咖喱，味道很不错。

——开罗君亲笔信

cn.description:
朱门酒肉臭，路有冻死骨！ 
四大家族助纣为虐！天罚将至！ 
逆天犯顺，必有异象。 
七月飞霜，唯有血偿。 

《暖雪》是一款暗黑风武侠类的动作Roguelite游戏。游戏以诡异的“暖雪”为核心打造了一个完全架空的黑暗奇幻世界，你将扮演代号“狴犴”的侠士去讨伐五大家族，拯救这个摇摇欲坠的世界！ 

【剑与雪的黑暗传说】 
龙武二十七年，天空突降怪雪，此雪不寒且温，亦不融。后世称之为“暖雪”。吸入“暖雪“的人丧失神智，变成怪物。自此人间堕入疯狂，世界飘摇欲坠。这一切的背后……究竟是天怒降罚，还是邪神作祟？ 将由你来探寻。 游戏中，你将作为侠士“狴犴”踏上旅途，寻找暖雪背后的真相，让黑暗迎来终结！ 

【自由搭配出万种变化】 
七大宗派，百般圣物，莫测神兵，丰富的Rogue元素让你百玩不厌。 七大独特宗派，十四种核心玩法，搭配海量神兵与圣物，每种圣物拥有四种完全不同的特殊效果，神兵又能与特定宗派联动诞生奇妙反应，每一次进入世界都是一场全新体验，选择你最喜爱的玩法，用万般过关方式，挑战无限可能。 

【超爽感的飞剑系统】 
剑来亦去，光影之间，灰飞烟灭。你可以操纵各式属性的飞剑对敌人进行多样化的打击，连携近战攻击与多种圣物加成，你可以一招制敌，亦可飞剑如雪，享受专属于你的畅爽战斗快感。 

【不断重生制敌，收集真相的碎片】
你可以通过消耗红色灵魂自由分配点数到天赋树中，永久地加强自己的能力。
没有人能直接告诉你暖雪世界的真相…….一切藏在随机掉落的“记忆碎片”之中，而你将不断重生制敌收集碎片。准备好发现五大家族间不为人知的骇人秘闻，层层剥开隐藏在故事背后的真相了吗？

【针对移动端进行的优化】
· 自定义键位及自动瞬身：根据你的喜好调整按钮的位置及大小，通过开关启用左摇杆自动瞬身。
· 自由调整视距：根据你的喜好调整屏幕显示的大小。
· 自动索敌：通过开关启用近战自动索敌，加倍丝滑战斗体验。

《暖雪》官方网站：game.bilibili.com/warmsnowapp/
《暖雪》B站动态：space.bilibili.com/1291089667/
《暖雪》官方QQ群：734381148
《暖雪》联系客服：game.bilibili.com/sdk/cs-h5/

最低设备要求：iOS12.0或更高版本，内存要求：4GB，可用RAM：3GB

*设置中集合了自定义按键、画质&视距调整等多种功能，请根据您的喜好自由选择~

-----------以下为本次更新内容----------

《漢末霸業》要求系統版本為iOS 16以上，並使用iPhone 8或8 Plus、iPhone X及以上、iPad Air 2、iPad mini 4、iPad 2017或任意iPad Pro進行遊戲。

官方微博：
http://weibo.com/longyougame
遊俠網合作論壇：
http://game.ali213.net/forum-1723-1.html
QQ群: 293787531   795489685
Facebook: 搜索 三國誌漢末霸業

【漢末霸業】基本介紹

【三國誌:漢末霸業】是由成都龍遊天下工作室精心制作的壹款回合制君主扮演模式的SLG遊戲。主要是以國人自己對三國遊戲的新思維，新角度來打造不壹樣的三國世界。在回歸傳統策略類的基礎上深度刻畫了三國各城市之間的地域差異以及每個武將自身能力和特性的異同，而在戰鬥方面突出結合天時地利人和的調配來進行作戰的魅力。


正式版遊戲特色：
壹：經典的白描繡像畫風，古樸典雅
人物頭像采用經典的《三國演義》連環畫的白描繡像畫風和上色。遊戲界面采用古風古韻設計，地道中國風。
二：簡單易上手的政務管理模式：
基礎的內政安排、人事探索、軍事偵察、技術開發都采用放置類管理模式，減少繁瑣的重復操作，讓玩家能聚焦其他事件。君主扮演模式，玩家只需要關註首都以及國家的管理。其他城市交給太守進行管理。使用方針給分城下達不同的軍政指令。

三：極其豐富的遊戲內容設定：
	超過1300名登場武將（包括歷史和演義武將）。 
	30項武將基本能力的細分化設計，更能體現武將之間的差異。
	超過300種以上的獨立配置的武將特性，全面凸顯武將個體差異。 
	超過500種有考據的物品寶物設定。多種分類劃分來滿足不同的喜好需求。
	近六十多個不同類型的城市，200多種有據可考的城市特征和特產。
	豐富的技術研究和開發項目，體現了科技對勢力發展的重要性。
	三大基本兵種和近二十種特殊兵種構成豐富的兵種體系。
	超豐富的官職系統。
	各種自然現象和事件災害模擬出多災多難的三國時期。 
	豐富的來訪事情，商人、仙人、名士、名醫、名匠、劍客遊走四方，引發各種功能事件。

四：回歸經典回合制，側重策略性排兵布陣的戰鬥系統
	天氣和地形、地塊高度的引入更加凸顯天時地利要素對戰爭的影響。
	野戰和攻城戰功能獨立分開。攻城有攻城車，霹靂車，井闌，守城有投石機、床弩、塞門刀車。更能凸顯攻守之間的平衡關系。

hk.description:
《無處遁形：全網公敵》是Steam平臺廣受好評的劇情向駭客解密遊戲《全網公敵》手遊版本。玩家通過網絡蒐索和社工手段獲取目標人物資訊，其隱藏最深的秘密都無處遁形。遊戲中的每個故事看似各自獨立，但隨著劇情的發展卻是草蛇灰線，伏脈千里。當所有事件串聯起來，竟隱藏著驚天的秘密……

希望玩家在遊玩的同時，對網絡本身也能產生反思，學會保護好個人隱私。

【遊戲內容】
◆第一章：程式師之死
某公司CEO跳樓自殺，自稱被毒妻勒索千萬； 而妻子卻在社交網絡上發佈被家暴的照片。 謠言滿天，誰在說謊？
◆第二章：看不見的眼睛
女大學生的不雅視頻在網絡瘋傳，這一刻，她已然社會性死亡。 到底誰才是始作俑者？ 女性的安全又該由誰去保護？
◆第三章：消失的證據
品學兼優的學生會長忽然失踪。 霸淩事件使案情越發撲朔迷離。 誰是兇手，誰是受害者？
◆第四章：羞辱的代價
天降巨瓜，女歌星再次被爆黑料！ 恐嚇信、炒作、前女團成員自殺事件……網絡再掀輿論狂歡！
◆第五章：永生代碼
當社會陷入癲狂，你是否也願意加入永生代碼，獲得真正的愛與永生？
◆DLC：甜蜜之家
一個看似甜蜜而美滿的家庭背後，每個人都有各自的秘密，隱藏在背後的真相到底是什麼？！
◆DLC：HelloWorld
一場離奇的車禍，讓泰坦公司的高級研究員Lucrezia Borgia博士當場死亡，同行的Benjamin Engle死裡逃生，但他卻沒有意識到自己即將捲入一場巨大的陰謀之中……

【遊戲特點】
◆代入感强：在虛構的世界裏，玩家扮演一名駭客，接受一家公司委託，完成一個個不同的社工事件，體驗真實的駭客操作。
◆玩法多樣：遊戲內有多個系統，除了社工系統，還會有推理、追跡、解謎，破壞侵入等系統需要玩家們去一一攻破。
◆劇情複雜：遊戲中你將面臨大量的選擇和謎題，而不同的選擇可能將導致不同的結局。
◆人物眾多：登場人物眾多，每個人物都有自己的性格特點，而他們背後都有著不為人知的故事，需要作為駭客的你去一一發現事件的真相。
◆全程配音：遊戲中所有出現的角色都有真人配音，讓整個遊戲的體驗和代入感更加强烈。
◆原創音樂：多首原創主題曲以及各種音樂音效，搭配精彩劇情，享受震撼體驗。

【覈心功能】
◆網絡蒐索：玩家通過瀏覽器搜索功能收集目標對象的基礎資訊。
◆資料庫：利用已知資訊輸入到資料庫中，通過篩選後或許目標對象的其他資訊。
◆破解：通過獲得的目標人物資訊來生成密碼，用於登入各平臺的帳戶（包括郵箱、社交平臺、聊天軟體等）。
◆偽裝：獲取目標對象的需求、社交圈等，根據資訊選擇偽裝，通過和目標對象接觸獲取更多資訊。
◆聊天溝通：添加目標對象為好友後，進行聊天溝通獲取資訊。
◆圖片分析：從圖片中獲取有價值的資訊內容及相關線索。
當然，後期還會解鎖更多的高階社工方法！

付费DLC「終業」現已推出！超大型量更新，揭開故事最終章，決戰何羅古神！
【v3.1.2 更新公告】
*請各位剷雪官直接進行安裝，不要將舊版本解除安裝，否則會丢失本地存檔！推薦使用雲存檔功能多次存檔備份~
*已新增離線登入功能，除首次安裝遊戲時需完成登入驗證，後續可於離線狀態下進行遊戲。

-----------以下為本次更新內容----------

DLC「終業」： 
狴犴於灰燼夢中昏睡的十年間，何羅邪神被徹底釋放，人間世一片狼藉。在玲瓏和眾人的苦苦支撐下何羅反抗軍曾一度看到希望，但在瘋狂與絕望面前，一切都是那麼脆弱…… 
而今狴犴終於從無盡噩夢中甦醒，回到現實世界，他將再次踏上旅途，展開最終之戰。
【新章節】新增五大章節，Boss強勁挑戰 
5大全新章節，帶領你穿越一個既熟悉又陌生的世界，逐步接近千年前隱藏在地心深處的蛇王朝聖地。 6位強大的關底Boss將為玩家帶來全新的挑戰！
【新宗派】三大全新宗派，暢快戰鬥體驗 
全新加入日月輪轉雙天、閻羅地藏明王、靈劍修羅三大宗派，以及6種宗派技能，為玩家帶來前所未有的戰鬥體驗！
【新天賦】森羅萬象系統，自由搭配殘響 
全新的天賦樹系統，有限的天賦點數將有限的天賦點數決定了成長路線的博弈和抉擇，更有無限森羅模式打破一切上限！ 配合特殊符文——時間殘響，豐富的條目和效果為build搭配提供更高的自由度和強度上限。
【新劇情】海量故事碎片，三大結局由你選擇
 古神之力無法輕易被摧毀，你的不同選擇將導致三大不同結局！穿越時間線，挑戰各種難度，尋找能拯救所有人的方法！
【新適配】移動端專屬功能 
新增「自動釋放收劍」功能，讓操作更加流暢
hk.description:
朱門酒肉臭，路有凍死骨！ 
四大家族助紂為虐！天譴將至！ 
逆天犯順，必有異象。 
七月飛霜，唯有血償。 

《暖雪》是一款暗黑風武俠類動作 Roguelike 遊戲。遊戲以詭異的「暖雪」為中心，塑造出完全虛構的黑暗奇幻世界。你在遊戲中扮演外號「狴犴」的俠士，討伐五大家族，拯救這個搖搖欲墜的世界！ 

【劍與雪的黑暗傳說】 
龍武二十七年，天空忽降怪雪，此雪不寒且溫，亦不融化。後世稱之為「暖雪」。吸入「暖雪」者無不喪失神智，變成怪物。自此人間墮入瘋狂，世界飄搖欲墜。這一切的背後……究竟是天怒降罰，還是邪神作祟？箇中真相為何，就待你探尋。你會遊戲中化身為俠士「狴犴」踏上旅途，尋找暖雪背後的真相，為黑暗時代畫上句號！ 

【自由配搭，變化萬千】 
七大宗派，百般聖物，莫測神兵，豐富的 Rogue 元素讓你百玩不厭。七大獨特宗派，十四種核心玩法，加上大量神兵和聖物，每種聖物均具有四種截然不同的特殊效果，神兵又能與特定宗派聯動，產生奇妙反應，讓你每次進入世界都必定會有一番全新體驗。選擇你的心水玩法，用萬千方式過關，挑戰無限可能。 

【爽爆飛劍系統】 
劍來亦去，光影之間，灰飛煙滅。你可以操縱各式屬性的飛劍，以多種方式打擊敵人。既可以結合近戰攻擊和多種聖物加成，一招制敵；亦可以飛劍如雪，享受獨一無二的舒暢戰鬥快感。 

【不斷重生殺敵，蒐集真相的碎片】
你可以消耗紅色靈魂，自由分配點數至天賦樹，永久加強自身能力。
沒有人能直接告訴你暖雪世界的真相……一切藏在隨機掉落的「記憶碎片」之中，而你將不斷重生殺敵，收集碎片。準備好查明五大家族間不為人知的駭人秘聞，層層剝開箇中真相了嗎？

【操作方便，專為手遊而設】
· 自訂按鍵位置及自動瞬身：玩家可隨個人喜好調整按鈕的位置及大小，更可切換啟用左搖桿自動瞬身功能。
· 自由調整視距：你可應個人喜好調整畫面的顯示大小。
· 自動索敵：切換啟用近戰自動索敵功能，令戰鬥體驗加倍順暢。

最低設備要求：iOS12.0 或更新版本，記憶體要求：4GB，可用 RAM：4GB

SUPPORT
遊戲中遇到任何問題，皆可透過遊戲內的客服中心提出回饋。

hk.description:
建構牌組，大開殺戒
Slime 3K 本次導入了新系統，牌組的建構多了進一步鑽研的空間，為類生存模式的公式玩法添加幾分戰略深度，以及更具創造性的實驗玩法。在遊戲中解鎖、升級、混合和配對你的卡牌，累積出威嚇四方的軍火庫，包含奇妙武器和詭譎特性。為每一場遊戲量身打造完美的浴血戰備！

戰況激烈，歷險求生
敵人無時無刻不在增添力量，你也應該跟上！探索所有的殲滅手段，樂在其中吧！例如：電死所有人、在地面坡酸- 電死每個人、在地面潑硫酸、用 AK-47 撂倒那些渺小人類、召喚殭屍或扔擲爆炸西瓜！

打包起來，全部帶走
做好心理準備，應付瘋狂暴君構思的所有創造物：騎士、突變、嫌惡機器人、芭蕾舞伶、踩高蹺雜耍、肉食性番茄，還有只有暴君才知道的其他玩意兒。好好享受壓碎那些粉紅色人類時，他們變得有如爆米花的樣子！

Keep the words, pictures, videos, voice and positions you want to record at any time and anywhere.
And there are reminders that you can never forget.

《漢末霸業》要求系統版本為iOS 16以上，並使用iPhone 8或8 Plus、iPhone X及以上、iPad Air 2、iPad mini 4、iPad 2017或任意iPad Pro進行遊戲。

官方微博：
http://weibo.com/longyougame
遊俠網合作論壇：
http://game.ali213.net/forum-1723-1.html
QQ群: 293787531   795489685
Facebook: 搜索 三國誌漢末霸業

【漢末霸業】基本介紹

【三國誌:漢末霸業】是由成都龍遊天下工作室精心制作的壹款回合制君主扮演模式的SLG遊戲。主要是以國人自己對三國遊戲的新思維，新角度來打造不壹樣的三國世界。在回歸傳統策略類的基礎上深度刻畫了三國各城市之間的地域差異以及每個武將自身能力和特性的異同，而在戰鬥方面突出結合天時地利人和的調配來進行作戰的魅力。


正式版遊戲特色：
壹：經典的白描繡像畫風，古樸典雅
人物頭像采用經典的《三國演義》連環畫的白描繡像畫風和上色。遊戲界面采用古風古韻設計，地道中國風。
二：簡單易上手的政務管理模式：
基礎的內政安排、人事探索、軍事偵察、技術開發都采用放置類管理模式，減少繁瑣的重復操作，讓玩家能聚焦其他事件。君主扮演模式，玩家只需要關註首都以及國家的管理。其他城市交給太守進行管理。使用方針給分城下達不同的軍政指令。

三：極其豐富的遊戲內容設定：
	超過1300名登場武將（包括歷史和演義武將）。 
	30項武將基本能力的細分化設計，更能體現武將之間的差異。
	超過300種以上的獨立配置的武將特性，全面凸顯武將個體差異。 
	超過500種有考據的物品寶物設定。多種分類劃分來滿足不同的喜好需求。
	近六十多個不同類型的城市，200多種有據可考的城市特征和特產。
	豐富的技術研究和開發項目，體現了科技對勢力發展的重要性。
	三大基本兵種和近二十種特殊兵種構成豐富的兵種體系。
	超豐富的官職系統。
	各種自然現象和事件災害模擬出多災多難的三國時期。 
	豐富的來訪事情，商人、仙人、名士、名醫、名匠、劍客遊走四方，引發各種功能事件。

四：回歸經典回合制，側重策略性排兵布陣的戰鬥系統
	天氣和地形、地塊高度的引入更加凸顯天時地利要素對戰爭的影響。
	野戰和攻城戰功能獨立分開。攻城有攻城車，霹靂車，井闌，守城有投石機、床弩、塞門刀車。更能凸顯攻守之間的平衡關系。

mo.description:
《無處遁形：全網公敵》是Steam平臺廣受好評的劇情向駭客解密遊戲《全網公敵》手遊版本。玩家通過網絡蒐索和社工手段獲取目標人物資訊，其隱藏最深的秘密都無處遁形。遊戲中的每個故事看似各自獨立，但隨著劇情的發展卻是草蛇灰線，伏脈千里。當所有事件串聯起來，竟隱藏著驚天的秘密……

希望玩家在遊玩的同時，對網絡本身也能產生反思，學會保護好個人隱私。

【遊戲內容】
◆第一章：程式師之死
某公司CEO跳樓自殺，自稱被毒妻勒索千萬； 而妻子卻在社交網絡上發佈被家暴的照片。 謠言滿天，誰在說謊？
◆第二章：看不見的眼睛
女大學生的不雅視頻在網絡瘋傳，這一刻，她已然社會性死亡。 到底誰才是始作俑者？ 女性的安全又該由誰去保護？
◆第三章：消失的證據
品學兼優的學生會長忽然失踪。 霸淩事件使案情越發撲朔迷離。 誰是兇手，誰是受害者？
◆第四章：羞辱的代價
天降巨瓜，女歌星再次被爆黑料！ 恐嚇信、炒作、前女團成員自殺事件……網絡再掀輿論狂歡！
◆第五章：永生代碼
當社會陷入癲狂，你是否也願意加入永生代碼，獲得真正的愛與永生？
◆DLC：甜蜜之家
一個看似甜蜜而美滿的家庭背後，每個人都有各自的秘密，隱藏在背後的真相到底是什麼？！
◆DLC：HelloWorld
一場離奇的車禍，讓泰坦公司的高級研究員Lucrezia Borgia博士當場死亡，同行的Benjamin Engle死裡逃生，但他卻沒有意識到自己即將捲入一場巨大的陰謀之中……

【遊戲特點】
◆代入感强：在虛構的世界裏，玩家扮演一名駭客，接受一家公司委託，完成一個個不同的社工事件，體驗真實的駭客操作。
◆玩法多樣：遊戲內有多個系統，除了社工系統，還會有推理、追跡、解謎，破壞侵入等系統需要玩家們去一一攻破。
◆劇情複雜：遊戲中你將面臨大量的選擇和謎題，而不同的選擇可能將導致不同的結局。
◆人物眾多：登場人物眾多，每個人物都有自己的性格特點，而他們背後都有著不為人知的故事，需要作為駭客的你去一一發現事件的真相。
◆全程配音：遊戲中所有出現的角色都有真人配音，讓整個遊戲的體驗和代入感更加强烈。
◆原創音樂：多首原創主題曲以及各種音樂音效，搭配精彩劇情，享受震撼體驗。

【覈心功能】
◆網絡蒐索：玩家通過瀏覽器搜索功能收集目標對象的基礎資訊。
◆資料庫：利用已知資訊輸入到資料庫中，通過篩選後或許目標對象的其他資訊。
◆破解：通過獲得的目標人物資訊來生成密碼，用於登入各平臺的帳戶（包括郵箱、社交平臺、聊天軟體等）。
◆偽裝：獲取目標對象的需求、社交圈等，根據資訊選擇偽裝，通過和目標對象接觸獲取更多資訊。
◆聊天溝通：添加目標對象為好友後，進行聊天溝通獲取資訊。
◆圖片分析：從圖片中獲取有價值的資訊內容及相關線索。
當然，後期還會解鎖更多的高階社工方法！

*請各位剷雪官直接進行安裝，不要將舊版本解除安裝，否則會丢失本地存檔！推薦使用雲存檔功能多次存檔備份~
*已新增離線登入功能，除首次安裝遊戲時需完成登入驗證，後續可於離線狀態下進行遊戲。

-----------以下為本次更新內容----------

DLC「終業」： 
狴犴於灰燼夢中昏睡的十年間，何羅邪神被徹底釋放，人間世一片狼藉。在玲瓏和眾人的苦苦支撐下何羅反抗軍曾一度看到希望，但在瘋狂與絕望面前，一切都是那麼脆弱…… 
而今狴犴終於從無盡噩夢中甦醒，回到現實世界，他將再次踏上旅途，展開最終之戰。
【新章節】新增五大章節，Boss強勁挑戰 
5大全新章節，帶領你穿越一個既熟悉又陌生的世界，逐步接近千年前隱藏在地心深處的蛇王朝聖地。 6位強大的關底Boss將為玩家帶來全新的挑戰！
【新宗派】三大全新宗派，暢快戰鬥體驗 
全新加入日月輪轉雙天、閻羅地藏明王、靈劍修羅三大宗派，以及6種宗派技能，為玩家帶來前所未有的戰鬥體驗！
【新天賦】森羅萬象系統，自由搭配殘響 
全新的天賦樹系統，有限的天賦點數將有限的天賦點數決定了成長路線的博弈和抉擇，更有無限森羅模式打破一切上限！ 配合特殊符文——時間殘響，豐富的條目和效果為build搭配提供更高的自由度和強度上限。
【新劇情】海量故事碎片，三大結局由你選擇
 古神之力無法輕易被摧毀，你的不同選擇將導致三大不同結局！穿越時間線，挑戰各種難度，尋找能拯救所有人的方法！
【新適配】移動端專屬功能 
新增「自動釋放收劍」功能，讓操作更加流暢
mo.description:
朱門酒肉臭，路有凍死骨！ 
四大家族助紂為虐！天譴將至！ 
逆天犯順，必有異象。 
七月飛霜，唯有血償。 

《暖雪》是一款暗黑風武俠類動作 Roguelike 遊戲。遊戲以詭異的「暖雪」為中心，塑造出完全虛構的黑暗奇幻世界。你在遊戲中扮演外號「狴犴」的俠士，討伐五大家族，拯救這個搖搖欲墜的世界！ 

【劍與雪的黑暗傳說】 
龍武二十七年，天空忽降怪雪，此雪不寒且溫，亦不融化。後世稱之為「暖雪」。吸入「暖雪」者無不喪失神智，變成怪物。自此人間墮入瘋狂，世界飄搖欲墜。這一切的背後……究竟是天怒降罰，還是邪神作祟？箇中真相為何，就待你探尋。你會遊戲中化身為俠士「狴犴」踏上旅途，尋找暖雪背後的真相，為黑暗時代畫上句號！ 

【自由配搭，變化萬千】 
七大宗派，百般聖物，莫測神兵，豐富的 Rogue 元素讓你百玩不厭。七大獨特宗派，十四種核心玩法，加上大量神兵和聖物，每種聖物均具有四種截然不同的特殊效果，神兵又能與特定宗派聯動，產生奇妙反應，讓你每次進入世界都必定會有一番全新體驗。選擇你的心水玩法，用萬千方式過關，挑戰無限可能。 

【爽爆飛劍系統】 
劍來亦去，光影之間，灰飛煙滅。你可以操縱各式屬性的飛劍，以多種方式打擊敵人。既可以結合近戰攻擊和多種聖物加成，一招制敵；亦可以飛劍如雪，享受獨一無二的舒暢戰鬥快感。 

【不斷重生殺敵，蒐集真相的碎片】
你可以消耗紅色靈魂，自由分配點數至天賦樹，永久加強自身能力。
沒有人能直接告訴你暖雪世界的真相……一切藏在隨機掉落的「記憶碎片」之中，而你將不斷重生殺敵，收集碎片。準備好查明五大家族間不為人知的駭人秘聞，層層剝開箇中真相了嗎？

【操作方便，專為手遊而設】
· 自訂按鍵位置及自動瞬身：玩家可隨個人喜好調整按鈕的位置及大小，更可切換啟用左搖桿自動瞬身功能。
· 自由調整視距：你可應個人喜好調整畫面的顯示大小。
· 自動索敵：切換啟用近戰自動索敵功能，令戰鬥體驗加倍順暢。

最低設備要求：iOS12.0 或更新版本，記憶體要求：4GB，可用 RAM：4GB

SUPPORT
遊戲中遇到任何問題，皆可透過遊戲內的客服中心提出回饋。
客服信箱：warmsnowgh@bilibili.com
官方網站：https://warmsnow.biligames.com
Twitter：https://twitter.com/WarmSnowGame
Discord: https://discord.gg/gC2nRfEQ
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@warmsnow6951

mo.description:
建構牌組，大開殺戒
Slime 3K 本次導入了新系統，牌組的建構多了進一步鑽研的空間，為類生存模式的公式玩法添加幾分戰略深度，以及更具創造性的實驗玩法。在遊戲中解鎖、升級、混合和配對你的卡牌，累積出威嚇四方的軍火庫，包含奇妙武器和詭譎特性。為每一場遊戲量身打造完美的浴血戰備！

戰況激烈，歷險求生
敵人無時無刻不在增添力量，你也應該跟上！探索所有的殲滅手段，樂在其中吧！例如：電死所有人、在地面坡酸- 電死每個人、在地面潑硫酸、用 AK-47 撂倒那些渺小人類、召喚殭屍或扔擲爆炸西瓜！

打包起來，全部帶走
做好心理準備，應付瘋狂暴君構思的所有創造物：騎士、突變、嫌惡機器人、芭蕾舞伶、踩高蹺雜耍、肉食性番茄，還有只有暴君才知道的其他玩意兒。好好享受壓碎那些粉紅色人類時，他們變得有如爆米花的樣子！

Keep the words, pictures, videos, voice and positions you want to record at any time and anywhere.
And there are reminders that you can never forget.

《漢末霸業》要求系統版本為iOS 16以上，並使用iPhone 8或8 Plus、iPhone X及以上、iPad Air 2、iPad mini 4、iPad 2017或任意iPad Pro進行遊戲。

官方微博：
http://weibo.com/longyougame
遊俠網合作論壇：
http://game.ali213.net/forum-1723-1.html
QQ群: 293787531   795489685
Facebook: 搜索 三國誌漢末霸業

【漢末霸業】基本介紹

【三國誌:漢末霸業】是由成都龍遊天下工作室精心制作的壹款回合制君主扮演模式的SLG遊戲。主要是以國人自己對三國遊戲的新思維，新角度來打造不壹樣的三國世界。在回歸傳統策略類的基礎上深度刻畫了三國各城市之間的地域差異以及每個武將自身能力和特性的異同，而在戰鬥方面突出結合天時地利人和的調配來進行作戰的魅力。


正式版遊戲特色：
壹：經典的白描繡像畫風，古樸典雅
人物頭像采用經典的《三國演義》連環畫的白描繡像畫風和上色。遊戲界面采用古風古韻設計，地道中國風。
二：簡單易上手的政務管理模式：
基礎的內政安排、人事探索、軍事偵察、技術開發都采用放置類管理模式，減少繁瑣的重復操作，讓玩家能聚焦其他事件。君主扮演模式，玩家只需要關註首都以及國家的管理。其他城市交給太守進行管理。使用方針給分城下達不同的軍政指令。

三：極其豐富的遊戲內容設定：
	超過1300名登場武將（包括歷史和演義武將）。 
	30項武將基本能力的細分化設計，更能體現武將之間的差異。
	超過300種以上的獨立配置的武將特性，全面凸顯武將個體差異。 
	超過500種有考據的物品寶物設定。多種分類劃分來滿足不同的喜好需求。
	近六十多個不同類型的城市，200多種有據可考的城市特征和特產。
	豐富的技術研究和開發項目，體現了科技對勢力發展的重要性。
	三大基本兵種和近二十種特殊兵種構成豐富的兵種體系。
	超豐富的官職系統。
	各種自然現象和事件災害模擬出多災多難的三國時期。 
	豐富的來訪事情，商人、仙人、名士、名醫、名匠、劍客遊走四方，引發各種功能事件。

四：回歸經典回合制，側重策略性排兵布陣的戰鬥系統
	天氣和地形、地塊高度的引入更加凸顯天時地利要素對戰爭的影響。
	野戰和攻城戰功能獨立分開。攻城有攻城車，霹靂車，井闌，守城有投石機、床弩、塞門刀車。更能凸顯攻守之間的平衡關系。

tw.description:
《無處遁形：全網公敵》是Steam平臺廣受好評的劇情向駭客解密遊戲《全網公敵》手遊版本。玩家通過網絡蒐索和社工手段獲取目標人物資訊，其隱藏最深的秘密都無處遁形。遊戲中的每個故事看似各自獨立，但隨著劇情的發展卻是草蛇灰線，伏脈千里。當所有事件串聯起來，竟隱藏著驚天的秘密……

希望玩家在遊玩的同時，對網絡本身也能產生反思，學會保護好個人隱私。

【遊戲內容】
◆第一章：程式師之死
某公司CEO跳樓自殺，自稱被毒妻勒索千萬； 而妻子卻在社交網絡上發佈被家暴的照片。 謠言滿天，誰在說謊？
◆第二章：看不見的眼睛
女大學生的不雅視頻在網絡瘋傳，這一刻，她已然社會性死亡。 到底誰才是始作俑者？ 女性的安全又該由誰去保護？
◆第三章：消失的證據
品學兼優的學生會長忽然失踪。 霸淩事件使案情越發撲朔迷離。 誰是兇手，誰是受害者？
◆第四章：羞辱的代價
天降巨瓜，女歌星再次被爆黑料！ 恐嚇信、炒作、前女團成員自殺事件……網絡再掀輿論狂歡！
◆第五章：永生代碼
當社會陷入癲狂，你是否也願意加入永生代碼，獲得真正的愛與永生？
◆DLC：甜蜜之家
一個看似甜蜜而美滿的家庭背後，每個人都有各自的秘密，隱藏在背後的真相到底是什麼？！
◆DLC：HelloWorld
一場離奇的車禍，讓泰坦公司的高級研究員Lucrezia Borgia博士當場死亡，同行的Benjamin Engle死裡逃生，但他卻沒有意識到自己即將捲入一場巨大的陰謀之中……

【遊戲特點】
◆代入感强：在虛構的世界裏，玩家扮演一名駭客，接受一家公司委託，完成一個個不同的社工事件，體驗真實的駭客操作。
◆玩法多樣：遊戲內有多個系統，除了社工系統，還會有推理、追跡、解謎，破壞侵入等系統需要玩家們去一一攻破。
◆劇情複雜：遊戲中你將面臨大量的選擇和謎題，而不同的選擇可能將導致不同的結局。
◆人物眾多：登場人物眾多，每個人物都有自己的性格特點，而他們背後都有著不為人知的故事，需要作為駭客的你去一一發現事件的真相。
◆全程配音：遊戲中所有出現的角色都有真人配音，讓整個遊戲的體驗和代入感更加强烈。
◆原創音樂：多首原創主題曲以及各種音樂音效，搭配精彩劇情，享受震撼體驗。

【覈心功能】
◆網絡蒐索：玩家通過瀏覽器搜索功能收集目標對象的基礎資訊。
◆資料庫：利用已知資訊輸入到資料庫中，通過篩選後或許目標對象的其他資訊。
◆破解：通過獲得的目標人物資訊來生成密碼，用於登入各平臺的帳戶（包括郵箱、社交平臺、聊天軟體等）。
◆偽裝：獲取目標對象的需求、社交圈等，根據資訊選擇偽裝，通過和目標對象接觸獲取更多資訊。
◆聊天溝通：添加目標對象為好友後，進行聊天溝通獲取資訊。
◆圖片分析：從圖片中獲取有價值的資訊內容及相關線索。
當然，後期還會解鎖更多的高階社工方法！

為什麼選擇 Day One？

Day One 是原創日記應用程式。十年來持續更新並增添功能，打造全球最隱密、最值得信賴，也最好用的日記平台。

簡單好用，讓人著迷

建構牌組，大開殺戒
Slime 3K 本次導入了新系統，牌組的建構多了進一步鑽研的空間，為類生存模式的公式玩法添加幾分戰略深度，以及更具創造性的實驗玩法。在遊戲中解鎖、升級、混合和配對你的卡牌，累積出威嚇四方的軍火庫，包含奇妙武器和詭譎特性。為每一場遊戲量身打造完美的浴血戰備！

戰況激烈，歷險求生
敵人無時無刻不在增添力量，你也應該跟上！探索所有的殲滅手段，樂在其中吧！例如：電死所有人、在地面坡酸- 電死每個人、在地面潑硫酸、用 AK-47 撂倒那些渺小人類、召喚殭屍或扔擲爆炸西瓜！

打包起來，全部帶走
做好心理準備，應付瘋狂暴君構思的所有創造物：騎士、突變、嫌惡機器人、芭蕾舞伶、踩高蹺雜耍、肉食性番茄，還有只有暴君才知道的其他玩意兒。好好享受壓碎那些粉紅色人類時，他們變得有如爆米花的樣子！

us.description:
Looking for a feature-packed and efficient media player to manage, organize, and play different types of video content? Enter VidHub! As the newest and most popular media player, VidHub serves up more than just the ability to play all types of video formats. With extensive media library management and network sharing functionalities, VidHub promises stable and speedy video playback for an exceptional user experience.

Some of the key features that VidHub offers include:
- Support iOS, Mac, Apple TV platform, data synchronization through iCloud
- Support for a comprehensive range of video formats, including .mkv、.avi、.mp4、.mov、.rmvb、.wmv, and more
- High-quality video playback for HD, 4K, HDR, and various other resolutions
- The ability to enable and disable subtitles, with support for embedded and external subtitle formats such as SRT, SSA, and SUB
- Network sharing capabilities, with support for SMB/CIFS, WebDav, and other protocols, as well as access to cloud-based video files from Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, and Baidu Netdisk, Aliyun disk, 139 drive, 115 netdisk, enabling easy access to video files on remote servers and cloud storage services.
- Support downloading and deleting cloud files
- Support renaming cloud files, support add character, replace character, regular expression renaming method.
- Support direct-link to Emby, Jellyfin, Plex media server.
- Built-in media library management tools, with an intuitive interface for displaying videos and customizable sorting options by type, date, rating, and more.

All in all, VidHub offers a fully-featured and outstanding media player experience, delivering the smoothest and highest-quality viewing experience for all types of video content, with all the customizations and features one could desire.

Note: The metadata and artwork are sourced from TMDB, a movie and TV show database that is maintained by the community.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use
https://okaapps.com/privacy_vidhub
https://okaapps.com/terms_vidhub

us.description:
Our app connects to YouTube in real-time and lets you play any video with exclusive features designed just for you!
Highlight Features:
• Locked screen playback: Keep listening to your videos’ audio in the background.
• Floating playback (PIP): Use other apps while watching your videos.
• Sleep timer: Set an automatic shutdown and relax worry-free.
• Loop mode: Play your favorite video on infinite repeat.
It also includes:
• Toggleable subtitles
• Playback speed control
• Quality selection and fullscreen mode
• Smart search with real-time suggestions (predictive search)
• Upload date filters: Day, week, month, or year
FyTube is perfect for those who don’t want to miss a single video about their favorite topics.
Explore, play, and enjoy your favorite content to the fullest — interruption-free!

SPECIAL FEATURES
FLOATING PLAYBACK
Never stop watching! With this feature, you can keep watching your videos while using other apps .
Just enter fullscreen mode and tap the PIP button — it’s the second icon at the top of the player.
Your video will float on top of your screen no matter what app you open!

LOCKED SCREEN PLAYBACK
Listen without interruptions!
Keep enjoying your video’s audio even when your screen is off. Perfect for listening to music, podcasts, or your favorite tunes while driving or relaxing.
How to activate it?
Just lock your device screen. You’ll instantly see the background player.
Tap Play — and that’s it! The audio will keep going without pauses.

SLEEP TIMER
Fall asleep peacefully — your app will stop by itself!
Enable this feature to automatically stop your videos after the time you choose. Perfect for sleeping or napping without worrying about stopping anything.
How to activate it?
Tap the timer button, choose how long you want it to run, and that’s it.
Relax and let the app handle the rest!

LOOP MODE
Play your favorite video over and over again!
Enable this feature to make the video repeat automatically as many times as you want.
How to know if it’s on?
The icon will turn red when active.
(VoiceOver compatible: it will indicate whether it’s on or off.)
Perfect for songs, meditations, or any content you love to repeat!

Need help using these features? Visit: fydub.com/fytube

BASIC FEATURES
• Fullscreen high-quality video playback
• Easy-to-use interface, friendly design
• Skip forward or rewind anytime — never miss the best parts
• Subtitle activation
• Adjust playback speed to your preference
• Change video quality
• Smart search with real-time suggestions and upload date filters: day, week, month, year, all
• Each video includes a related videos section to discover more interesting content
• Discover the latest videos and stay up to date with the news
• Our app connects directly to YouTube, letting you find any video
• Enjoy content on any AirPlay-compatible device
• VoiceOver compatible (enhanced descriptions)
• No account required
• We don’t store cache, cookies, or personal data without your permission — watch safely
• Interface available in 29 languages
• NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS
Get FyTube with a one-time payment and start a new streaming experience — ad-free and subscription-free.

us.description:
A blob of goo used to create artificial humans has become sentient and risen up against its creator — the Despot, an evil AI and (unfortunately) ruler of the world in the year 3000! Become this murderous jelly and pave your path with death, violence and pretzels in this action-packed roguelite from the creators of Despot's Game and Despotism 3K. We tried to blatantly clone games like Vampire Survivors, Halls of Torment, Brotato, Soulstone Survivors and 20 Minutes Till Dawn, but our crazy experiments went too far. By introducing a shop straight out of AutoChess and some TCG deckbuilding mechanics to the familiar formula, we created what we've dubbed our perfect abomination: Slime 3K.

DECKBUILDING MEETS MEATGRINDING
Slime 3K adds strategic depth and more creative experimentation to the survivor-like formula by introducing a deep deckbuilding system. Unlock, upgrade, mix and match your cards to stock up an impressive arsenal of zany weapons and traits. Create the perfect bloodbath loadout for each run!

SURVIVE THE ONSLAUGHT
Your enemies get stronger every minute, and so should you! Explore tons of fun approaches to good ol' annihilation — electrocute everyone, throw acid on the floor, mow down puny humans with an AK-47, summon zombies, or throw explosive watermelons!

GOTTA BLOB 'EM ALL
Get ready to take on every creation the mad Despot can come up with: knights, mutants, cyborg abominations, ballerinas, stilt acrobats, carnivorous tomatoes, and Despot knows what else. The tiny pink humans make such a satisfying pop when you crush them!

us.releaseNotes:
The paid DLC “The End Of Karma” is now available! A massive update that unveils the final chapter of the story, and the decisive battle against the ancient god He Luo!

【v3.1.2 Patch Notes】
*Please install the game directly and do not uninstall the old version, otherwise you will lose your local save files! It is recommended to use the cloud save function for backup~
*The offline feature is now available. You will only need to complete the login verification after the initial game installation. Subsequently, you are able to play in the offline mode.

-----------The following is the content of this update----------

DLC “The End Of Karma”: 
For ten years, 'Bi-an' slumbered in a dream of ashes while the malevolent Heluo deity was fully unleashed, turning the world into chaos. Under the arduous support of Linglong and others, the Heluo Resistance once saw a glimmer of hope, but everything seemed so fragile in the face of madness and despair… 
Now, 'Bi-an' has awakened from the endless nightmare and returned to the real world. He will embark on his journey once more, initiating the ultimate battle.

 【New Chapters】Five New Chapters, Intense Boss Challenges 
Five brand new chapters will lead you through a world that is both familiar and strange, gradually approaching the sacred grounds of the Snake Dynasty, hidden deep within the earth’s core a thousand years ago. Six formidable end-of-chapter Bosses will present new challenges to players! 

【New Sects】Three New Sects, Smooth Combat Experience
 Three new sects are introduced: Wheels of Solar and Lunar, Underworld Vidyaraja, and Soul Blade Shura, along with six sect skills, offering players a novel combat experience! 

【New Talents】System of All Things, Free Talisman Matching 
A new talent tree system allows limited talent points to dictate your growth strategy and choices, and an Infinite Mode that breaks through all limits! Coupled with the special rune - Time Talisman, the diverse entries and effects provide greater freedom and intensity for build combinations. 

【New Story】Abundant Story Segments, Three Endings for Your Choices 
The might of the ancient gods is not easily extinguished; your decisions will lead to three distinct endings! Traverse timelines, face various challenges, and find a way to save everyone! 

【New Adaptation】Mobile-Exclusive Features 
A new “Automatically activate Sword Sheathing” feature has been added for enhanced gameplay smoothness.
us.description:
While the rich stinks of meat and wine, the bones of the poor litter the roadside.
Great injustice often leads to strange occurrences
Snow in July can only be remedied through blood.

Warm Snow is a Roguelike action game with a background set in a dark fantasy world, where the eerie 'Warm Snow' holds sway. You will play as the Warrior 'Bi-an' on a crusade against the Five Great Clans, in order to save a world teetering on the brink of destruction.

【A Dark Tale of Sword and Snow】
A strange phenomenon appeared during the 27th Year of the Longwu Era. Snow fell from the sky, which was warm rather than cold to the touch, and did not melt.
People who breathed in the 'Warm Snow' lost their minds and became monsters. This phenomenon was later known as 'Warm Snow'.
Embark on a journey as Warrior 'Bi-an' to search for the truth behind the 'Warm Snow' and put an end to the this never-ending darkness.

【Countless Combinations】
Seven sects, varied Relics, unpredictable excaliburs, the game is full of Rogue-like elements which will keep each challenge in your journey fresh and unique.
Each time you venture into the world would be a whole-new experience, pick your favorite playing style and challenge yourself.

【Thrilling Flying Sword System】
Perform critical destruction with swords that flicker between shadow and light. Control your flying swords with different attributes, attack modes and Relic boosts.

【Reincarnate and Collect the Fragments of Truth】
You decide how you will grow stronger!
Boost your abilities with talent points that you can assign at will.
The truth about this world is hidden in the randomly dropped 'Memory Fragments'.
Are you ready to discover the secrets behind the Five Great Clans and reveal the truth of this world?

【Mobile Version Optimizations】
· Button customization and Auto-Dash: Adjust the position and size of buttons according to your preferences. Enable the Auto-Dash feature to start auto dashing with the left joystick.
· Adjust the viewing distance freely: Adjust the size of the screen display according to your preferences.
· Auto Enemy Tracking: Enable the Auto Enemy Tracking feature for a silky smooth combat experience.

Minimum device requirement: iOS 12.0 or higher. Memory requirement: 4GB. Available RAM: 4GB

SUPPORT
If you encounter any issues during the game, you can send us feedback via the in-game Customer Service Center.
Customer Service Email: warmsnowgh@bilibili.com
Official Site: https://warmsnow.biligames.com
Twitter：https://twitter.com/WarmSnowGame
Discord: https://discord.gg/gC2nRfEQ
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@warmsnow6951

us.description:
One of the best hack-and-slash games of all time now fits in your pocket!

Originally released on PC in 2006, Titan Quest is an action RPG set against a mythological backdrop. The Titans have escaped from prison and are hell-bent on destroying the Earth. The Gods alone can’t stop them -- a hero is needed to lead this epic struggle. Victory or defeat will determine humanity’s fate and that of the Olympians.

You are that hero! Create your character, explore ancient civilizations like Greece, Egypt, Babylon, and China, and fight against hordes of legendary creatures! Master the arts of archery, swordsmanship or magic and upgrade your character to unlock awesome powers! Discover special items to help you complete your quest: legendary swords, devastating thunderbolts, enchanted bows, and much more!

Specially adapted for mobile devices, this new version offers numerous new features:

● A new touch-friendly interface 
● Completely redesigned touch-friendly gameplay 
● High-quality graphics
● A huge, open world to explore
● Full day/night cycle
● 80 different mythological creatures: Minotaurs, Cyclopses, Gorgons, and many more
● 1200+ items to discover
● 30 different character classes 
● 150 different character skills
● Colossal playtime of more than 60 hours 
● Scalable difficulty modes:  weapons and enemies match your skill level 
● Dozens of unlockable achievements to discover
● No ads, no microtransactions. 

Mixing ancient mythology with non-stop action, Titan Quest is a classic hack-and-slash offering energizing gameplay with a fast, intense rhythm. Overcome thrilling challenges and vanquish the greatest enemies ever to invade the mobile world!

DLCs available as in-app purchase: 
● IMMORTAL THRONE - Encounter the greatest villains of Greek mythology, brave the attacks of Cerberus, and hazard the banks of the River Styx to conquer this dark new adventure.
● RAGNARÖK - In the uncharted lands of northern Europe, you’ll brave the realms of the Celts, the Northmen, and the Asgardian gods!
● ATLANTIS - Set out on a journey across the western Mediterranean, in search of the mythical kingdom of Atlantis. Including the Tartarus Arena for epic battles!
● ETERNAL EMBERS - Summoned by the legendary Emperor Yao, the Hero is called back into the East to deal with a demonic threat that has been ravaging the land after the Telkine was slain.

us.description:
"Did you know that “Schadenfreude” is a German word defined as the concept of finding joy in someone else’s misfortune? It is also the main idea on which Neighbours back From Hell is built. A whole TV show based on playing increasingly outrageous pranks on your grumpy neighbor to keep the audience entertained, and viewership numbers high. It’s good to be bad in this early 2000s trash TV-inspired slapstick extravaganza! 

As Woody, the vengeful star protagonist of Neighbours back From Hell, you will prank your way through Seasons 1 and 2 of the fictitious, but aptly named TV show. Take the mischief from your nasty neighbor’s flat all the way to China, India, and Mexico where you will make sure his holiday is a living hell. While you’re at it, why limit targeting your antics at your neighbor, when you can involve his mother and fellow travelers? Whatever you decide to do, your trusty camera crew will be right there and keep a keen eye on all the action. You can let your crooked creativity flow freely and watch the neighbor rage in desperation. Just be mindful not to get caught by him or his companions, or they will whoop you good and your TV show will be taken off the air. If you perform well on the other hand, by creating more and more disarray and chaos in the neighbor’s life, ratings will increase, and you could win prestigious awards. "

Neighbours From Hell 1 & 2 Remastered in one package: 28 episodes set in the neighbor’s home, on a cruise liner, and in several different holiday locations around the world 

- All graphics newly rendered in Full HD 
- Framerate of all animations doubled for a smoother experience  
- Use stealth, skill, and style to perform the perfect ambush 
- Easy to use interface and controls 
- Superb cartoon-style graphics 
- Big band soundtrack 
- Game Center support
- Full controller support

© HandyGames

us.description:
Finally, Heart Machine's award winning slash-'em-up arrives to iOS in the most polished and refined version yet, the Special Edition.


► Winner of the Audience Award and Excellence in Visual Art awards of the prestigious Independent Games Festival.

► 14 + nominations among the Best Visual Design, Best Audio and Best original Game categories.

► 9/10 Destructoid - A hallmark of excellence. There may be flaws, but they are negligible and won't cause massive damage.

► 9.5/10 Game Informer - The combination of soundtrack, art, and combat creates a rabbit hole worth your full exploration.

► Eurogamer Recommended - Heart Machine's slash-'em-up is punishing and precise - and incredibly beautiful.

► 9/10 GameSpot - It is more than simply pretty; Hyper Light Drifter uses its visuals to both guide and relax you. The grandest vistas calm your pulse between difficult, breathless combat sequences.

► 8.5 Polygon - Hyper Light Drifter deftly mixes contemplative moments with breakneck action.

► 5 Stars Darkstation - The top-down action-RPG Hyper Light Drifter is an amazing game: gorgeous, a fascinating world to explore, tight controls, beautiful music, and the faith in the player for you to figure things out on your own.


Echoes of a dark and violent past resonate throughout a savage land, steeped in treasure and blood. Drifters of this world are the collectors of forgotten knowledge, lost technologies and broken histories. Our Drifter is haunted by an insatiable illness, traveling further into the lands of Buried Time, hoping to discover a way to quiet the vicious disease.

Hyper Light Drifter is an action adventure RPG in the vein of the best 16-bit classics, with modernized mechanics and designs on a much grander scale. Explore a beautiful, vast and ruined world riddled with dangers and lost technologies.


Features:

● 120 fps gameplay on iPad Pro / 60 fps on iPhone and iPad.
● Compatible with MFi controllers.
● Game Center achievements.
● Haptic Vibration.
● From each character to subtle background elements, everything is lovingly hand-animated.
● Easy to pick up, difficult to master; enemies are vicious and numerous, hazards will easily crush your frail body, and friendly faces remain rare.
● Upgrade weapons, learn new skills, discover equipment and traverse a dark, detailed world with branching paths and secrets abound.
● Evocative soundtrack composed by Disasterpeace.
● All the content from the original game + more weapons, enemies and areas from the Special edition.

The Squadron has reached your mobile device! Dodge a bullet storm and face fearsome aerial war machines! Lead your squadron to victory in two different campaigns, full of story twists and legendary boss fights!

ACES OF THE LUFTWAFFE - SQUADRON is an action-packed vertical scrolling shoot‘ em-up with a fascinating and fully voiced narrative. Dodge bullets, collect massive power-ups and wisely use special abilities to defeat your enemies. Two campaigns with 50 levels in total, waves of various deadly enemies and a lot of epic boss fights. Are you up to this task?

When Europe seemed to be free, a secret German commando called The Aces of the Luftwaffe took their chance to strike back and invade the USA! It’s your duty to restore peace and liberty aboard deadly wings of steel in bombastic air battles! However, every story has two sides. While the Aces of Luftwaffe begin their assault on the United States, you are charged with leading a squad of elite German pilots on a secret mission. Embarc on an epic aerial adventure of intrigue and deceit from a secret base in the Bermuda Triangle. Choose your side, decide your role and take off!

Game Introduction
Mobile Empire is a simulation game based on "manufacturing mobile phones", with a high degree of freedom. You will play as an entrepreneur back in 2001. You acquired the initial capital from a mystery investor because of your unique vision and created a technological enterprise that may change the world. The game starts from 2001 and ends in 2035, during which you will start with old school smartphones in the early R&D stages, progressing until AR smart glasses can be independently used. During the 35 years, you will experience, witness, and promote the magnificent development process of smartphones. You have the chance to develop your company into the world's number one technological enterprise.

• Unique theme
Currently, Mobile Empire is probably the only PC simulation game based on "manufacturing mobile phones". You will have the chance to create miracles and develop your little-known company into a global technological empire. 

• Innovative competition experience
In order to simulate a real business environment, lots of competitors will be constantly updated. Players may cooperate with them for joint development or poach talents from them. 

• Massive amounts of random events
In order to create a better "sense of the world", a great deal of industrial events, world events, crisis events, lucky events, employee events, and news interviews are set in this game for you to make your own choices.

• Bountiful blueprints
The game includes 65 different cell phone blueprints and more than 100 cell phone appearances from 3x3 keypads to full-screen and folding screens, and even includes futuristic AR smart glasses. Bountiful blueprints are yours to explore. 

• Vast technologies
In this game, there are many technologies and accessories are available for upgrade. In addition, with adequate funds, you can even research and develop CPUs with superior performance and experience better operating systems. Customized naming is also supported.

• Creative persuasion system
In terms of talent recruitment, the game provides a very distinctive "persuasion" system. To acquire the top talents, you need to use different communication skills to persuade the recruits according to their personalities.

• Other contents for you to explore
The game also includes credit ratings, company acquisitions, employee development, outsourcing mode, intelligence system, company strategies, and more for you to explore.

• "Mobile Empire" IOS supports the archive of PC games.

us.description:
Juicy Realm is a roguelike game with fruits as enemies. It is set in a world in which the line between animals and plants is blurred. It began with the tipping of the food-chain, which forced the humans to establish an outpost and begin an investigation in the region where the first species of mutated plants was discovered. The military has prepared a vast number of powerful weapons, with you leading the vanguard forces to wage this long war.

Subverted Order
“Many years later, when the humans watch as the plants climb up to the top of the food chain, they will be reminded of their own naivety and arrogance…”
Only when all the plants started to evolve into animals, growing limbs and becoming sentient, did the humans realize the threat of those photosynthetic-lifeforms. No one knows how they achieved the state of evolution that took animal lifeforms millions of years to reach in such a short amount of time, and no one knows their ultimate objective. The only thing known for sure is that the humans now face the greatest challenge since they climbed up to the top of the food chain.

Gameplay
As the first explorers of this unknown region, you must strive to venture deep into the enemy hive, defeat all kinds of fruits and arm yourself with various equipment, as well as upgrade yourself with the resources you find in your way.

Game Features
-Rougelite elements such as random terrains, loot drops, and monsters
-Hundreds of special and bizarre weapons and items
-Loads of unique mod enemies and bosses
-10 characters in the roster with unique skills and abilities
-Unique artstyle with rich details

A story-driven experience about two doctors traversing backwards through a dying man's memories to artificially fulfill his last wish.

ABOUT THIS GAME
Dr. Rosalene and Dr. Watts have peculiar jobs: They give people another chance to live, all the way from the very beginning... but only in their patients' heads.

Due to the severity of the operation, the new life becomes the last thing the patients remember before drawing their last breath. Thus, the operation is only done to people on their deathbeds, to fulfill what they wish they had done with their lives, but didn’t.

This particular story follows their attempt to fulfill the dream of an elderly man, Johnny. With each step back in time, a new fragment of Johnny's past is revealed. As the two doctors piece together the puzzled events that spanned a life time, they seek to find out just why the frail old man chose his dying wish to be what it is.

And Johnny's last wish is, of course... to go to the moon.

MORE DETAILS
"To the Moon", a story-driven RPG with pixel graphics, was originally developed six years ago for PC by Canadian producer Kan Gao and Freebird Games, his indie game studio.Rights to develop and publish the remastered mobile version of "To the Moon" were acquired by X.D. Network Inc.
The story of "To the Moon" unfolds before players, much like a movie. While the entire game has no battle system and can be completed in a few hours, the compelling story and moving original soundtrack resonated with players worldwide. On top of receiving overwhelmingly positive ratings, "To the Moon" received multiple awards from Gamespot, Metacritic, WIRED, and more, and was nominated for "I'm Not Crying, There's Something In My Eye" in the 2016 Steam Awards.

KEY FEATURES
•	Unlocked 29 new iMessage stickers.
•	Added "Music Box" function, allowing backstage music playing& in-game music downloading(will be enabled automatically after clearing the stage).
•	Added "DIY QR code" function, allowing one-key sharing of player data for playing on different devices.
•	A unique & non-combat story-driven experience
•	Innovative mix between adventure game elements and classic RPG aesthetics
•	Acclaimed original soundtrack that closely ties to the story
•	An espresso execution with zero filler and no time drains

us.description:
ICEY is a 2D side-scrolling action game. As you follow the narrator's omnipresent voice, you will see through ICEY's eyes and learn the truth about her world. 

“Alright, you caught me! This ISN'T really just a simple 2D action game, and you WON'T be seeing through ICEY's eyes... NOR will you learn the truth about her world." says the narrator. 

“ICEY is a Meta game in disguise. The narrator will constantly urge you in one direction, but you must ask, "Why? Why am I following his directions? Why can't I learn the truth about this world and ICEY's purpose here?" Fight against his tyranny, and uncover what's really going on for yourself!

In fact, you can become ICEY, and let loose the shackles of your own identity. You are ICEY, and ICEY is you... if you want it that way. Feel free to keep hold of your own self, if you wish. 

Now Is the Time For You to Discover the Truth.

tr.description:
A blob of goo used to create artificial humans has become sentient and risen up against its creator — the Despot, an evil AI and (unfortunately) ruler of the world in the year 3000! Become this murderous jelly and pave your path with death, violence and pretzels in this action-packed roguelite from the creators of Despot's Game and Despotism 3K. We tried to blatantly clone games like Vampire Survivors, Halls of Torment, Brotato, Soulstone Survivors and 20 Minutes Till Dawn, but our crazy experiments went too far. By introducing a shop straight out of AutoChess and some TCG deckbuilding mechanics to the familiar formula, we created what we've dubbed our perfect abomination: Slime 3K.

DECKBUILDING MEETS MEATGRINDING
Slime 3K adds strategic depth and more creative experimentation to the survivor-like formula by introducing a deep deckbuilding system. Unlock, upgrade, mix and match your cards to stock up an impressive arsenal of zany weapons and traits. Create the perfect bloodbath loadout for each run!

SURVIVE THE ONSLAUGHT
Your enemies get stronger every minute, and so should you! Explore tons of fun approaches to good ol' annihilation — electrocute everyone, throw acid on the floor, mow down puny humans with an AK-47, summon zombies, or throw explosive watermelons!

GOTTA BLOB 'EM ALL
Get ready to take on every creation the mad Despot can come up with: knights, mutants, cyborg abominations, ballerinas, stilt acrobats, carnivorous tomatoes, and Despot knows what else. The tiny pink humans make such a satisfying pop when you crush them!

tr.description:
While the rich stinks of meat and wine, the bones of the poor litter the roadside.
Great injustice often leads to strange occurrences
Snow in July can only be remedied through blood.

Warm Snow is a Roguelike action game with a background set in a dark fantasy world, where the eerie 'Warm Snow' holds sway. You will play as the Warrior 'Bi-an' on a crusade against the Five Great Clans, in order to save a world teetering on the brink of destruction.

【A Dark Tale of Sword and Snow】
A strange phenomenon appeared during the 27th Year of the Longwu Era. Snow fell from the sky, which was warm rather than cold to the touch, and did not melt.
People who breathed in the 'Warm Snow' lost their minds and became monsters. This phenomenon was later known as 'Warm Snow'.
Embark on a journey as Warrior 'Bi-an' to search for the truth behind the 'Warm Snow' and put an end to the this never-ending darkness.

【Countless Combinations】
Seven sects, varied Relics, unpredictable excaliburs, the game is full of Rogue-like elements which will keep each challenge in your journey fresh and unique.
Each time you venture into the world would be a whole-new experience, pick your favorite playing style and challenge yourself.

【Thrilling Flying Sword System】
Perform critical destruction with swords that flicker between shadow and light. Control your flying swords with different attributes, attack modes and Relic boosts.

【Reincarnate and Collect the Fragments of Truth】
You decide how you will grow stronger!
Boost your abilities with talent points that you can assign at will.
The truth about this world is hidden in the randomly dropped 'Memory Fragments'.
Are you ready to discover the secrets behind the Five Great Clans and reveal the truth of this world?

【Mobile Version Optimizations】
· Button customization and Auto-Dash: Adjust the position and size of buttons according to your preferences. Enable the Auto-Dash feature to start auto dashing with the left joystick.
· Adjust the viewing distance freely: Adjust the size of the screen display according to your preferences.
· Auto Enemy Tracking: Enable the Auto Enemy Tracking feature for a silky smooth combat experience.

Minimum device requirement: iOS 12.0 or higher. Memory requirement: 4GB. Available RAM: 4GB

SUPPORT
If you encounter any issues during the game, you can send us feedback via the in-game Customer Service Center.
Customer Service Email: warmsnowgh@bilibili.com

tr.description:
One of the best hack-and-slash games of all time now fits in your pocket!

Originally released on PC in 2006, Titan Quest is an action RPG set against a mythological backdrop. The Titans have escaped from prison and are hell-bent on destroying the Earth. The Gods alone can’t stop them -- a hero is needed to lead this epic struggle. Victory or defeat will determine humanity’s fate and that of the Olympians.

You are that hero! Create your character, explore ancient civilizations like Greece, Egypt, Babylon, and China, and fight against hordes of legendary creatures! Master the arts of archery, swordsmanship or magic and upgrade your character to unlock awesome powers! Discover special items to help you complete your quest: legendary swords, devastating thunderbolts, enchanted bows, and much more!

Specially adapted for mobile devices, this new version offers numerous new features:

● A new touch-friendly interface 
● Completely redesigned touch-friendly gameplay 
● High-quality graphics
● A huge, open world to explore
● Full day/night cycle
● 80 different mythological creatures: Minotaurs, Cyclopses, Gorgons, and many more
● 1200+ items to discover
● 30 different character classes 
● 150 different character skills
● Colossal playtime of more than 60 hours 
● Scalable difficulty modes:  weapons and enemies match your skill level 
● Dozens of unlockable achievements to discover
● No ads, no microtransactions. 

Mixing ancient mythology with non-stop action, Titan Quest is a classic hack-and-slash offering energizing gameplay with a fast, intense rhythm. Overcome thrilling challenges and vanquish the greatest enemies ever to invade the mobile world!

DLCs available as in-app purchase: 
● IMMORTAL THRONE - Encounter the greatest villains of Greek mythology, brave the attacks of Cerberus, and hazard the banks of the River Styx to conquer this dark new adventure.
● RAGNARÖK - In the uncharted lands of northern Europe, you’ll brave the realms of the Celts, the Northmen, and the Asgardian gods!
● ATLANTIS - Set out on a journey across the western Mediterranean, in search of the mythical kingdom of Atlantis. Including the Tartarus Arena for epic battles!
● ETERNAL EMBERS - Summoned by the legendary Emperor Yao, the Hero is called back into the East to deal with a demonic threat that has been ravaging the land after the Telkine was slain.

tr.description:
"Did you know that “Schadenfreude” is a German word defined as the concept of finding joy in someone else’s misfortune? It is also the main idea on which Neighbours back From Hell is built. A whole TV show based on playing increasingly outrageous pranks on your grumpy neighbor to keep the audience entertained, and viewership numbers high. It’s good to be bad in this early 2000s trash TV-inspired slapstick extravaganza! 

As Woody, the vengeful star protagonist of Neighbours back From Hell, you will prank your way through Seasons 1 and 2 of the fictitious, but aptly named TV show. Take the mischief from your nasty neighbor’s flat all the way to China, India, and Mexico where you will make sure his holiday is a living hell. While you’re at it, why limit targeting your antics at your neighbor, when you can involve his mother and fellow travelers? Whatever you decide to do, your trusty camera crew will be right there and keep a keen eye on all the action. You can let your crooked creativity flow freely and watch the neighbor rage in desperation. Just be mindful not to get caught by him or his companions, or they will whoop you good and your TV show will be taken off the air. If you perform well on the other hand, by creating more and more disarray and chaos in the neighbor’s life, ratings will increase, and you could win prestigious awards. "

Neighbours From Hell 1 & 2 Remastered in one package: 28 episodes set in the neighbor’s home, on a cruise liner, and in several different holiday locations around the world 

- All graphics newly rendered in Full HD 
- Framerate of all animations doubled for a smoother experience  
- Use stealth, skill, and style to perform the perfect ambush 
- Easy to use interface and controls 
- Superb cartoon-style graphics 
- Big band soundtrack 
- Game Center support
- Full controller support

© HandyGames

tr.description:
Finally, Heart Machine's award winning slash-'em-up arrives to iOS in the most polished and refined version yet, the Special Edition.


► Winner of the Audience Award and Excellence in Visual Art awards of the prestigious Independent Games Festival.

► 14 + nominations among the Best Visual Design, Best Audio and Best original Game categories.

► 9/10 Destructoid - A hallmark of excellence. There may be flaws, but they are negligible and won't cause massive damage.

► 9.5/10 Game Informer - The combination of soundtrack, art, and combat creates a rabbit hole worth your full exploration.

► Eurogamer Recommended - Heart Machine's slash-'em-up is punishing and precise - and incredibly beautiful.

► 9/10 GameSpot - It is more than simply pretty; Hyper Light Drifter uses its visuals to both guide and relax you. The grandest vistas calm your pulse between difficult, breathless combat sequences.

► 8.5 Polygon - Hyper Light Drifter deftly mixes contemplative moments with breakneck action.

► 5 Stars Darkstation - The top-down action-RPG Hyper Light Drifter is an amazing game: gorgeous, a fascinating world to explore, tight controls, beautiful music, and the faith in the player for you to figure things out on your own.


Echoes of a dark and violent past resonate throughout a savage land, steeped in treasure and blood. Drifters of this world are the collectors of forgotten knowledge, lost technologies and broken histories. Our Drifter is haunted by an insatiable illness, traveling further into the lands of Buried Time, hoping to discover a way to quiet the vicious disease.

Hyper Light Drifter is an action adventure RPG in the vein of the best 16-bit classics, with modernized mechanics and designs on a much grander scale. Explore a beautiful, vast and ruined world riddled with dangers and lost technologies.


Features:

● 120 fps gameplay on iPad Pro / 60 fps on iPhone and iPad.
● Compatible with MFi controllers.
● Game Center achievements.
● Haptic Vibration.
● From each character to subtle background elements, everything is lovingly hand-animated.
● Easy to pick up, difficult to master; enemies are vicious and numerous, hazards will easily crush your frail body, and friendly faces remain rare.
● Upgrade weapons, learn new skills, discover equipment and traverse a dark, detailed world with branching paths and secrets abound.
● Evocative soundtrack composed by Disasterpeace.
● All the content from the original game + more weapons, enemies and areas from the Special edition.

tr.description:
You are trapped in an endless underground passageway.
Observe your surroundings carefully to reach "The Exit 8".




Don't overlook any anomalies.

If you find anomalies, turn back immediately.

If you don't find anomalies, do not turn back.

To go out from Exit 8.





The Exit 8 is a short walking simulator inspired by Japanese underground passageways, liminal spaces and back rooms.

Game Introduction
Mobile Empire is a simulation game based on "manufacturing mobile phones", with a high degree of freedom. You will play as an entrepreneur back in 2001. You acquired the initial capital from a mystery investor because of your unique vision and created a technological enterprise that may change the world. The game starts from 2001 and ends in 2035, during which you will start with old school smartphones in the early R&D stages, progressing until AR smart glasses can be independently used. During the 35 years, you will experience, witness, and promote the magnificent development process of smartphones. You have the chance to develop your company into the world's number one technological enterprise.

• Unique theme
Currently, Mobile Empire is probably the only PC simulation game based on "manufacturing mobile phones". You will have the chance to create miracles and develop your little-known company into a global technological empire. 

• Innovative competition experience
In order to simulate a real business environment, lots of competitors will be constantly updated. Players may cooperate with them for joint development or poach talents from them. 

• Massive amounts of random events
In order to create a better "sense of the world", a great deal of industrial events, world events, crisis events, lucky events, employee events, and news interviews are set in this game for you to make your own choices.

• Bountiful blueprints
The game includes 65 different cell phone blueprints and more than 100 cell phone appearances from 3x3 keypads to full-screen and folding screens, and even includes futuristic AR smart glasses. Bountiful blueprints are yours to explore. 

• Vast technologies
In this game, there are many technologies and accessories are available for upgrade. In addition, with adequate funds, you can even research and develop CPUs with superior performance and experience better operating systems. Customized naming is also supported.

• Creative persuasion system
In terms of talent recruitment, the game provides a very distinctive "persuasion" system. To acquire the top talents, you need to use different communication skills to persuade the recruits according to their personalities.

• Other contents for you to explore
The game also includes credit ratings, company acquisitions, employee development, outsourcing mode, intelligence system, company strategies, and more for you to explore.

• "Mobile Empire" IOS supports the archive of PC games.

tr.description:
Juicy Realm is a roguelike game with fruits as enemies. It is set in a world in which the line between animals and plants is blurred. It began with the tipping of the food-chain, which forced the humans to establish an outpost and begin an investigation in the region where the first species of mutated plants was discovered. The military has prepared a vast number of powerful weapons, with you leading the vanguard forces to wage this long war.

Subverted Order
“Many years later, when the humans watch as the plants climb up to the top of the food chain, they will be reminded of their own naivety and arrogance…”
Only when all the plants started to evolve into animals, growing limbs and becoming sentient, did the humans realize the threat of those photosynthetic-lifeforms. No one knows how they achieved the state of evolution that took animal lifeforms millions of years to reach in such a short amount of time, and no one knows their ultimate objective. The only thing known for sure is that the humans now face the greatest challenge since they climbed up to the top of the food chain.

Gameplay
As the first explorers of this unknown region, you must strive to venture deep into the enemy hive, defeat all kinds of fruits and arm yourself with various equipment, as well as upgrade yourself with the resources you find in your way.

Game Features
-Rougelite elements such as random terrains, loot drops, and monsters
-Hundreds of special and bizarre weapons and items
-Loads of unique mod enemies and bosses
-10 characters in the roster with unique skills and abilities
-Unique artstyle with rich details

A story-driven experience about two doctors traversing backwards through a dying man's memories to artificially fulfill his last wish.

ABOUT THIS GAME
Dr. Rosalene and Dr. Watts have peculiar jobs: They give people another chance to live, all the way from the very beginning... but only in their patients' heads.

Due to the severity of the operation, the new life becomes the last thing the patients remember before drawing their last breath. Thus, the operation is only done to people on their deathbeds, to fulfill what they wish they had done with their lives, but didn’t.

This particular story follows their attempt to fulfill the dream of an elderly man, Johnny. With each step back in time, a new fragment of Johnny's past is revealed. As the two doctors piece together the puzzled events that spanned a life time, they seek to find out just why the frail old man chose his dying wish to be what it is.

And Johnny's last wish is, of course... to go to the moon.

MORE DETAILS
"To the Moon", a story-driven RPG with pixel graphics, was originally developed six years ago for PC by Canadian producer Kan Gao and Freebird Games, his indie game studio.Rights to develop and publish the remastered mobile version of "To the Moon" were acquired by X.D. Network Inc.
The story of "To the Moon" unfolds before players, much like a movie. While the entire game has no battle system and can be completed in a few hours, the compelling story and moving original soundtrack resonated with players worldwide. On top of receiving overwhelmingly positive ratings, "To the Moon" received multiple awards from Gamespot, Metacritic, WIRED, and more, and was nominated for "I'm Not Crying, There's Something In My Eye" in the 2016 Steam Awards.

KEY FEATURES
•	Unlocked 29 new iMessage stickers.
•	Added "Music Box" function, allowing backstage music playing& in-game music downloading(will be enabled automatically after clearing the stage).
•	Added "DIY QR code" function, allowing one-key sharing of player data for playing on different devices.
•	A unique & non-combat story-driven experience
•	Innovative mix between adventure game elements and classic RPG aesthetics
•	Acclaimed original soundtrack that closely ties to the story
•	An espresso execution with zero filler and no time drains

tr.description:
ICEY is a 2D side-scrolling action game. As you follow the narrator's omnipresent voice, you will see through ICEY's eyes and learn the truth about her world. 

“Alright, you caught me! This ISN'T really just a simple 2D action game, and you WON'T be seeing through ICEY's eyes... NOR will you learn the truth about her world." says the narrator. 

“ICEY is a Meta game in disguise. The narrator will constantly urge you in one direction, but you must ask, "Why? Why am I following his directions? Why can't I learn the truth about this world and ICEY's purpose here?" Fight against his tyranny, and uncover what's really going on for yourself!

In fact, you can become ICEY, and let loose the shackles of your own identity. You are ICEY, and ICEY is you... if you want it that way. Feel free to keep hold of your own self, if you wish. 

Now Is the Time For You to Discover the Truth.
